title: Calories in In-N-Out Spread
meta_description: Discover in n out spread calories per serving, plus full nutrition breakdown including fat, carbs, sodium, and tweaks for your burger.
assumptions: Standard serving (2 tbsp or 35g) as used on burgers; Thousand Island-style sauce with mayo, ketchup, relish, and spices.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by exact recipe, portion size, and brand equivalents; In-N-Out values are estimates. Check official sources when available.

quick_answer.text: One serving of In-N-Out spread provides ~240 kcal, mostly from fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in In-N-Out spread?
faqs.a: About 240 kcal per standard 2 tbsp serving.

faqs.q: What are the macros for In-N-Out spread calories?
faqs.a: Per serving: 24 g fat, 10 g carbs (9 g sugars), 1 g protein.

faqs.q: Is In-N-Out spread high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, ~510 mg sodium per serving from ingredients like ketchup and relish.

faqs.q: How does In-N-Out spread compare to Thousand Island dressing?
faqs.a: Similar profile; both ~240 kcal per 2 tbsp, but spread has unique relish tang.

faqs.q: Can I reduce calories in In-N-Out spread?
faqs.a: Use half portion or light mayo swaps to cut ~120 kcal per serving.
